name: Flex Squad
description:
Controls
WASD or Arrow Keys. Mouse for user interface.
Your squad shoots on its own, no need for the mouse during combat.

This is a Ludum Dare 51 game. Theme: "Every 10 seconds".
Survive for 10 seconds and receive a combat reward. Customize your squad as needed.

Note that this is a prototype, in a finished game, there would be more characters and options for customization.

Have fun!
